feed.title: Bioinformatics Technology Lab
feed.subtitle: Bioinformatics Technology Lab at Canada's Michael Smith Genome Sciences Centre. Primarily interested in de novo genome assembly. More description.

entry.title: Tweeting is not publishing!
entry.content:

  • publishing

Things that are not publishing:

  • tweeting
  • presenting at AGBT

entry.title: Simon and garFUNKel
entry.content:
Hello darkness my old friend, I’ve come to talk with you again. Because a vision softly creeping left its seeds while I was sleeping.

I am just a poor boy though my story seldom told. I squandered my resistance on a pocket full of mumbles such are promises. All lies and jests, still the man hears what he wants to hear and disregards the rest.

When I left my home and my family I was no more than a boy
entry.summary: Hello darkness my old friend, I’ve come to talk with you again. Because a vision softly creeping left its seeds while I was sleeping.
